185421828.review: freezes all the time on my 4070 gbu ..am requesting a refund
185421828.developer_response:
Hiii there, I'm really sorry to hear about how frequently Assassin's Creed Origins has been freezing lately. If you are using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/582160/discussions/0/4630358592048884249/]investigation[/url] and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help limit how often these crashes occur:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still freezing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

185421237.review: Buy on Dec 20, 2024 and want to start play the AC Franchise but really disappointing as it is keep freezing, would like to refund !! the Ubisoft Connect Play make it worse, Uninstall everything !
185421237.developer_response:
Hello randy.wijaya.l! If you are still running into this freezing issue with Assassin's Creed Origins, I'd really like to help if I can. To cover all our bases, I have some steps and workarounds that are designed to limit freezing problems like this and will help with eliminating potential problems in advance. Please take the time to go through them now, but keep in mind that if one method resolves the freezing for you, there's no need to proceed with the others:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

If this freezing happens again after those steps are done successfully, please follow up and let our teams know by submitting a new support case on the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]Ubisoft website[/url]and be sure to list all of the troubleshooting that we completed to save time. Our technical support team can also review [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]your MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]once they are attached to your case (which you can do in advance). After your case has been received, a specialist will be able to contact you directly to proceed further. Thank you!

不好不坏的罐头，问号太多和对主线的等级限制导致剧情的撕裂感严重，而且地点在埃及导致沙子有点太多了，有点审美疲劳

西奈dlc量很小，不过算是补充了兄弟会设定
法老dlc量挺大的，但是
那些法老一个个攻击快还不吃硬直，只能慢慢刮，点名阿肯那顿，攻击范围广，间格短，还有拉美西斯，一套投技把我满级老八打掉5/6血，不过这个dlc的美术很不错，虽然拉美西斯的神国只有沙子（审美疲劳了），图坦卡门的蓝莲花很好看
老八的盾的防御功能还是有些幽默，我个人基本用不到
只能说刺客信条正统在对马岛之魂（）

185322422.review:
十里八乡好小伙，乐于助人巴耶克。隔壁老肯威看了都得竖大拇指。你是什么支线都得做一做啊！
  从锡瓦的守护者，到埃及守护者，再到人民的无形者。起源讲的不仅仅是刺客组织的成长之路，内线更是展现着巴耶克的变化之路。人物塑造真的很不错，有血有肉，恩怨分明。
  游戏画面更是没的说，导览做的也很不错，谁会拒绝花钱买游戏顺便游览古埃及的感觉呢。画面很精致，对配置的需求也不是很高，如果你不是极致党的话，普通的轻薄本也可以带的动。
  战斗手感没的说，起源可以说是从刺杀主流变为了狂战士主流，毕竟是刺客组织的开端，狂战士化也能理解不是（摸下巴.JPG）
  最喜欢的剧情是圣甲虫和鳄鱼的两个部分，做的真的很好，有泪点，有反转，有刀（做的好啊育碧，还我夏迪亚）
  以上为游戏本体内容，DLC方面无形者和法老王还是值得入手的，内容流程适中，算是对剧情的一个延续，但美中不足的是，在进无形者剧情之前，必须得把一些支线做完，不然有些剧情里的角色你会发现你根本就没见过。因为他们这些角色会出现在一些不在主线道路上的支线里。无形者会给一套很不错的皮肤，可以买一匹很帅的马，外观党可以考虑入手，总而言之，是一款很有水准的RPG游戏，适合慢慢玩。

185274876.review:
當年發布時所釋出的埃及風光影片讓我對這一代深感興趣,趁冬特入手,是我第一款正式體驗的系列作品.說一下目前的遊玩體驗供想入手的人參考:

1.這是一款以古埃及全域為藍圖的動作RPG,過了序章之後全地圖開啟,可以自由的在無縫的廣大地圖自由探索
2.遊戲存在極強的等級壓制,遇到紅骷髏圖標的敵人請盡速遠離,除了打他們的傷害刮痧之外還很容易被秒,反之,當你等級比敵人高時就換他們倒霉
3.地圖拉到最遠可以在每塊省分看到一個盾牌圖標,左右顯示的數字就是該區域的敵人等級,這樣可以依自身等級來判斷前往該區域所面臨的風險
4.主角是個超人,壓住攀爬鍵後幾乎沒有上不去的地方,那怕是看起來光滑的牆面或柱子......
5.莎草紙尋寶和來自諸神的饋贈這種獎勵和等級同步的任務可以晚點再做,如此能省下不少升級裝備的錢
6.戰鬥有機率被敵人重擊倒地,此時要按"空白鍵"才會起身,這點遊戲似乎沒有提示,害我掛了好幾次
7.遊戲切喚回現實的女主及其筆電裡的個人檔案已看得出有DEI污染的影子......其實每代把故事好好講完就行,這種切換回現代的劇情只會營造出莫名其妙的割裂感而已
8.遊戲崩潰目前遇到3次,還好存檔沒壞,只是不懂這些3A大作不給玩家手動分開存檔避險到底是有甚麼毛病?

結論:遊戲裡由埃及和希臘建築所構成的開放世界確實宏偉壯觀,且內建導覽模式,算是寓教於樂,只是不知UB這家公司還能撐多久呢......

185267052.review:
One of the best games I've ever played. 10/10 for me... Graphically a beauty, excellent combat, ancient Egypt setting is immersive and recreated w/ excellent attention to detail, the RPG progression/ upgrading systems, using senu to Mark enemies and loot, the story, great fast travel formula, the locations, variety of enemy wildlife,  interesting and abstract boss fights, the day and night cycle (w. Meditation), being able to use your torch to illuminate dark tombs or at night time, u can call your mount basically anytime you're not in a tomb or inside of structure, u can climb anything as long as there's somewhere to grab on, the blood stains on Bayek after a combat scenario, stealth/ stealth kills,  picking up dead enemies and throwing them off a building, cliff into bodies of water, or throwing a torch on top to burn them, swimming and attacking underwater, abundance of riverboats for quick naval travel,  I could go on.
It's an excellent game and very memorable experience all around.  
Sidenote : The periodic in-game NPC side chatter in the background is my only gripe (inneee sejeriet / HAANE cheruuu "or w/e gets a little annoying 😂). but it doesn't take anything away from the game being a masterpiece. 💯☑️🥂👌

185260921.review:
Eh, this is... a game. Not a great one, not a bad one. Combat is absolutely janky, and the perception of enemies is absolutely crappy. The whole game looks good and has ultrawide support, but is it a fun game? Does it compare to the glory of older Assassin's Creed titles? Not for me, because the world, despite its graphics and vast size, feels empty, pointless, and hastily stitched together. I know all Ubisoft games have you climb up somewhere and do the sync, but this instance feels remarkably unspecial.

It's okay entertainment. I played it while watching shows or listening to podcasts. This game is basically a digital fidget spinner: it keeps you occupied with doing something, but that's about it.

It's worth the price if you get it on sale.

185258929.developer_response:
Hi there LUFI_SAN, I'm really sorry to see that Assassin's Creed Origins has become unplayable due to these crashes. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still unable to play your game after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

185247029.review:
Assassin’s Creed Origins, c’est bien plus qu’un simple jeu, c’est un voyage dans l’Égypte antique. La première chose qui frappe, c’est la beauté et la grandeur de la carte : des pyramides majestueuses, des oasis verdoyantes, des temples grandioses, et même des villes animées comme Alexandrie et Memphis. On se sent vraiment transporté dans une autre époque.

Le gameplay a été repensé pour être plus dynamique. Les combats sont plus stratégiques, avec un système de compétences qui permet de personnaliser son style. Et que dire des quêtes secondaires ? Elles sont variées et ajoutent de la profondeur au monde.

L’histoire de Bayek est touchante et donne du sens à chaque action. On ne se contente pas de tuer des ennemis, on vit sa quête de justice. Avec un cycle jour-nuit et une faune vivante (oui, tu peux croiser des crocodiles ou chevaucher un chameau), l’immersion est totale.

En bref, si tu cherches un jeu qui allie exploration, action, et une plongée historique exceptionnelle, Assassin’s Creed Origins est un incontournable. C’est une aventure qui marque et qu’on n’oublie pas.

Si je devais noté 

Gameplay 19,5/20

Protagonistes 20/20

Lore 20/20

Personnage secondaire 17/20

Le parcours 16/20

Conseil jouer infiltration

Mas eu ter q upar 5 leveis pra ter mais chances de conseguir completar a missão é foda, dependendo das missões eu nem reclamo, mas tem umas que são tão repetitivas que não da vontade de fazer.

Fora isso o jogo é bom, não tive nenhum bug ou problemas do tipo
9/10

185210897.review:
장점
- 고퀄리티 그래픽
- 세일시 가격대비 플탐이 훌륭
- 가이드 모드 등 콘텐츠가 많음
- 유비의 학구열을 볼수 있는 엄청난 연출력

단점
- 내 기준, 어렵고 스트레스 받는 전투
- 최적화 약간 아쉬운 정도
- 유비식 오픈월드라 벌써 좀 지긋지긋함


어크 시리즈를 이 게임으로 처음 입문했는데
이 게임의 꽃이자 타 게임들과의 차별성은
뭐니뭐니해도 투어 가이드 입니다.

초반 스토리 진행 할때는 나쁘지 않다
정도의 느낌이었다가, 투어 가이드 에서의
엄청난 유적지와 설명들, 학구열 높은
유비가 끌어온 실제 이미지들을 보며
역사 공부를 하다보니 여행을 간듯한 경이로움을 느꼈습니다. 얼마나 유비가 노력을 기울인 작품인지 느껴집니다.

스핑크스와 피라미드 꼭대기에 서서 아래를 내려다보니 정말 짜릿하더군요.
유비식 지겨운 오픈월드의 단점이 있다지만,
투어 가이드 때문에라도 꼭 추천하고 싶은 게임입니다.

185198638.developer_response:
Hey there, I'm sorry to see that Assassin's Creed Origins has become unplayable due to the game freezing so often. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still freezing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

185177113.review:
Товарищи, игра может и хорошая, но узнать это мне не суждено, как и Вам если у Вас стоит Windows 11 24H2. Состоянием на январь 2025 года на данной версии ОС игра постоянно зависает, причем намертво, подробнее можете почитать в центре сообщества, там много обсуждений на эту тему. Если кратко, играть просто невозможно, поэтому проверьте Вашу версию Windows и если она совпадает с указанной выше, ни в коем случае не покупайте. Я не знаю как наиграл 3 часа по версии Steam, скорее всего игра просто висела как фоновый процесс и из-за этого шел счетчик. Возможно позже проблему исправят, но учитывая то, что игра 2017 года, а также видя политику Ubisoft в последнее время, верится в это с трудом.

Что касается самой игры, она не так плоха как утверждают некоторые издания, да, это не совсем привычный Assassin`s Creed, скорее древнеегипетский Ведьмак, но мое мнение, что игра все-таки хорошая и стоит Вашего внимания.

185061232.review:
Its in the name, This game is the origin of the assassin brotherhood in which every game before it takes place. The game introduces RPG elements, allowing for a greater sense of character progression and customization. The revamped combat system feels more fluid and dynamic, with the ability to switch between ranged and melee attacks, making each encounter unique. The vast, detailed landscapes—from the pyramids to the bustling streets of Alexandria—are breathtaking, adding a layer of authenticity to the world-building. The story, centered around the origin of the Assassin Brotherhood, is engaging, offering a compelling personal journey for the protagonist, Bayek.

However, while Assassin's Creed Origins has many strengths, it’s not without its flaws. The game’s slow pacing in certain sections can make it feel like a grind, especially with the abundance of side missions that sometimes feel repetitive. The transition to an RPG-style progression system may not be appealing to long-time fans of the series who prefer the traditional stealth gameplay. Additionally, some players might find the open-world exploration overwhelming, with a map that can feel a bit too vast at times.

Pros:

Stunning open-world environment, rich with detail and history.
Engaging story and character development.
Revamped combat system with dynamic mechanics.
Deep RPG elements offering customization and progression.
Cons:

Slow pacing and grindy side missions.
Transition to RPG mechanics may alienate traditional fans.
Vast map can feel overwhelming and sometimes tedious to explore.

184978802.developer_response:
Hey there, I'm SO sorry to see that Assassin's Creed Origins has become unplayable due to these crashes. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still unable to play your game after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184959313.review:
In short: It's a beautiful game but the story is incredibly bad and not captivating. Therefore, I don't recommend it. If you don't care about story or like what I dislike (see below), go for it. 

While I enjoyed the environment and to finally have a beautiful game set in ancient egypt, I really have issues with the storytelling. It's about a guy and his wife who are completely driven by vengance for their dead son, killing people left and right in self-rightousness. The quests are also often like a casual "Oh you are bothered by a tax collector? Let me kill him and his friends for you." I find this kind of "problem solving" highly problematic. Whilst I don't think people who are playing shooter games necessarily go on a shooting rampage or something, I do believe that being exposed to this kind of "thinking" and "reasoning" (i.e. He's mean, let's just kill him") for a longer period of time/repeatedly will leave it's mark on peoples mind. It's also so flat and uncreative, it stopped me from following the story early on. It's just not motivating at all. It's cool to explore the world, I like many things there, like the people in ptolemain egypt speaking greek rather than Egyptian and so on. But story/character motivation is incredibly bad. I haven't followed it to the end, admittedly, but I think failing to motivate one to do so is reason enough to dislike it.

184954887.developer_response:
Hi Matiss! I'd like to tackle some straightforward troubleshooting steps and some additional workarounds that have proven helpful to others facing similar technical issues. If you haven't already tried them, please do so now as they might save us time, and note if one of these solutions resolves this freezing issue, you won't need to do the rest:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

If Assassin's Creed Origins still freezes on you after those steps are done successfully, please follow up and let our teams know by submitting a new support case on the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]Ubisoft website[/url]and be sure to list all of the troubleshooting that we completed to save time. Our technical support team can also review [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]your MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]once they are attached to your case (which you can do in advance). After your case has been received, a specialist will be able to contact you directly to proceed further. Thank you!

184951569.review:
Wow, it was even better than I expected. A fantastic game and a true Assassin’s Creed at its core, mixed with RPG elements and an open world. The combat system is pretty average, but that actually works in its favor, letting you focus on stealth, which is phenomenal here. Quietly clearing out forts is pure joy.

The Egyptian landscapes (even with visuals that are a bit dated but still not annoying), the setting, and the overall atmosphere are excellent. The cities feel unique, and each visit offers a fresh experience. The story is fairly standard but elevated by the protagonist, who’s genuinely relatable and easy to root for.

The RPG elements are well-implemented too—I was gathering resources for upgrades all the way to the end, including hunting, which turned out to be a fun activity without feeling like a grind. There were even caravans carrying materials, though attacking them didn’t feel necessary since wood and metal were plentiful otherwise.

A big bonus goes to the Tour mode, which offers an interactive look into the life, culture, and history of ancient and late Egypt. It was genuinely fascinating to listen to.

Overall, the game left a huge AAA impression. You can really see the massive amount of effort put into seemingly minor details, like animations for everyday tasks such as moving giant stones, complete with someone sprinkling water on the ground ahead of it. It’s these hundreds of little touches that create a rich, vibrant world. Huge thanks to the developers for that!

184947010.review: Так, це воно. Ця гра, по суті, почала нову сторону серії і я думав вона буде поганою, але я помилявся. Великий (дійсно великий я не всюди навіть був), красивий і дійсно цікавий відкритий світ котрий наповнений життям. Гарна, гармонічна та часами драйвова бойовка та заголом геймплей. Дійсно прекрасний сюжет, в котрому починаєш розбиратися і насолоджуватися їм. Наш дорогий меджай це взагалі пісня, відкритий та щирий персонаж котрому хочеться співчувати та за котрого хоччеться грати. З мінусів до гри можна додати лише систему левелінгу, при котрій щоб пройти квест ти бігаєш та питаєш у всіх чи треба їм з чимось допомогти, але це можна спокійно вибачити. Пройти сюжет за 30 годин і отримати задоволення від цього, вважаю  це крутим. І під кінець 9 шкур крододила з 10)

184936698.review:
This game was incredible. Playing this game, I plunged into the times of Egypt 2000 years ago and saw a very interesting story about the beginning of the Assassin brotherhood. The game is quite intense with a lot of sights. The pyramids of Giza and the great Sphinx are noteworthy. In this Egypt you will visit ancient cities like Alexandria and Memphis, where the culture of Egypt was born. 
The game has quite good graphics and drawing of the view contours. The plot of the game is made against the backdrop of revenge, but it was not as simple as it first seemed. It can be given 8/10. 
The game has two additions: Invisible and Curse of the Pharaohs. They will also make you hold your breath while watching cutscenes and other interesting moments. 
The character is quite interesting, he fights for people and protects them from true evil, like most assassins, but Bayek, made by Ubisoft, fits into this game just right. I can give this game a solid 8/10.

184924485.review:
I had fun in the first 10-20h and then it started to get really repetitive and pointless gameplay.
Story is meh, and the whole world even though if feels alive it's not immersive at all.
At the beggining you get all legendary tier weapons from ubi if you bought DLC or are part of some club (don't know exactly) and it's just ridiculous how easy the game is, so I had just constantly force myself not to use them. Also there is this ingame shop - if you are feeling weak, you can literally buy skill points to make your game easier - what the actual fuck xD. I know that I'm reviewing game from 2018 and sounds like those things are new to me, but yeah, they are.
One more word about the story - I absolutely cannot stand the narration that we are the good guys fighting evil where literally at any point we are merciless mercenaries. Poor soul - you want evade some taxes? no problemo, I'm just gonna go and persu... kill this tax collector for you.
Also almost every second sidequest lacks summary - they finish the moment you get to the place, take something with you or whatever, and there is very often moment that the guy that wanted something from you says thank you at the end. It's not the big deal, but at some point it got to me how off I felt about that.
If I would pay full price back in the day for it I would be pissed

184912520.review:
I was impressed by this game. I only played AC (the first one) briefly, years ago, and I have to say, the amount of work that went into AC Origins is titanic. The world is amazing, both in detail and size. If you love ancient Egyptian history, you will love this aspect of the game.
Even the weapons and outfits fit perfectly (for the most part) with the world.

I also like the little details, like using your torch to light interior light sources, the horse coming to you running from behind (especially useful when running away from an unreasonably hard fight), the caged lions that can still claw at you through the bars, and so on.

That being said, the characters are kind of sterile and lack means to build a narrative connection with the player. The NPCs are dumber than a sack of rocks, the AI is more A than I, and the gameplay is nothing to write home about.

However, if you plan to have some mindless fun in an immersive and beautifully crafted world, then wait for a large discount and buy the game.

184898645.review:
I used to play this game a lot in high school.  Now that I am an adult, I decided to give it another go, since I had so many fond memories of playing it on my PS4.

Gameplay: 
The gameplay is honestly great.  Sometimes I will get on just to go through enemy forts or outposts because sneaking around, shooting enemies, and assassinating them is just so satisfying and fun.  There are many different ways of approaching areas that you will never go through an area the same way twice.

Story: 
The story was alright.  I feel like the pacing was a little off at times, especially during the final quests.  Most of the targets that you have to assassinate usually require you to complete a quest or two that involve you trying to track down and find your target.  During the last few, though, you are basically told "hey, this is your target, go to the quest marker to kill them."  It made the last couple of missions feel very "eh" to me, so the finale of this journey to find the man and people responsible for killing your son just didn't have the impact that it could've.  However, many of the other story quests, as well as several of the side quests, were pretty well done and made for a fun and interesting experience that kept me going.

Issues that I had: 
While many of the side-quests were really fun, a lot of them were really cut-and-paste.  A lot of them follow the same format: talk to quest giver, go to fort/outpost/enemy-encampment, use Senu to locate target, kill target, return to quest giver, fin.  If it's not that format, then it is usually: talk to quest giver, go to location, use Senu to locate item, grab item, retun to quest giver, fin.  There really isn't a whole lot of variety with many of the side quests, which made doing a lot of them incredibly boring.  There are plenty that are interesting, but outside of those, the side-quests are very formulaic.

I also feel that the item leveling is a little wonky.  I'm specifically referring to the level of weapons found in containers scaling to your level, but weapons dropped from enemies are scaled to *their* level.  This means that you can be level 40 going to through a level 33 fort, and you will loot level 40 weapons from the containers, but enemies will only drop level 33 weapons.  This means that there is little incentive to explore areas until you're almost finished with the game, since you can return all the way back to Siwa (the starting area) and loot all of the locations and get a bunch of high level weapons instead of looting them for weapons when you come across them initially.

There's also just in general not a whole lot of reason to explore until you reach the end of the game.  Sure, you *could* go to all of the marked locations as you discover new regions, but why *would* you?  Outside of crafting endgame gear and getting a leveled weapon, most locations don't really offer much beyond XP and materials that you can get pretty much anywhere else.  It can still be fun to explore, especially since this game is absolutely beautiful, but there really isn't a driving force compelling the player to explore much beyond where the story or quests take them.

Overall:
I think this game is worth it.  It was a fun time, and I am probably going to try New Game+ once I get done with all of the side content and DLC.  I would wait for it to go on sale, though.  I got the Gold Edition for fairly cheap during a sale for about $60 IIRC, which I think is worth it for this game.

184877840.review:
I gave Assassin's Creed Origins a try since it marked a big shift in the franchise, but I wouldn't recommend it either as a standalone game or as part of the series.

First, Origins feels more like an open-world fighting game than a true Assassin's Creed experience. There are many moments where you can't assassinate enemies and instead are forced into combat.

The story is disjointed due to excessive flashbacks, and while there's a sense of urgency in the main plot, the game's levelling system forces you to grind side quests just to keep up. This makes it easy to forget key details of the story by the time you return to it.

The gear system also feels flawed—items are always upgraded based on level, regardless of their quality. This diminishes the significance of legendary gear.

184874920.review:
Fazia 12 anos que não jogava nenhum assassin's creed e decidi dar uma chance a "trilogia RPG" começando pelo Origins e posso dizer que foi um bom começo. Talvez até diria um BOM RECOMEÇO para a franquia.

Bayek é um personagem bem simples. Um pai que perde o filho jura vingança contra aqueles responsáveis pela sua morte. Na verdade essa história foi contada tantas vezes que quando percebi isso me desanimei um pouco. Mas ao longo do jogo fui me convencendo que esse subtexto combinava muito com ele. Além disso, a inserção da Aya, esposa de Bayek, consegue manter o enredo significativamente mais interessante e tirando o foco do Bayek Medjai e transferindo-o para o Bayek lider dos Ocultos. 

A história não é incrível, diria até que bem mediana, mas funciona. O destaque claramente é a construção dos cenários. O Egito é muito lindo. Cada construção e todo o processo de ambientação é muito bem feito e cuidadoso. A Ubisoft não perdeu o talento para isso. Mas se não fosse a opção de habilitar o assassinato instantâneo (capacidade de matar furtivamente qualquer inimigo) eu confesso que não teria gostado do jogo o quanto gostei. Os elementos de RPG não incomodam, mas estar furtivo e acabar alertando todos os guardas quando tenta assassinar um guarda é muito frustrante. 

Por fim, acredito que em uma promoção esse jogo valha sim. é uma experiência contida e bem divertida com dezenas de maneiras de montar sua build para enfrentar os inimigos. A variedade de equipamentos te deixa bem flexível durante o combate, mas acredito que ficaram faltando equipamentos que ajudassem no stealth, por fim Bayek termina mais como um guerreiro do que como um assassino e as lutas de boss fights obrigatórias são bem anti-climáticas também. Mas para uma franquia que está a tanto tempo fazendo a mesma coisa, esse jogo conseguiu arriscar e entregar uma boa experiência em um cenário que eu nunca imaginei funcionar tão bem.

184874187.review:
A recriação do Egito é o ponto alto do jogo. Das pirâmides de Gizé às cidades de Alexandria e Memphis, cada local é muito detalhado.
A fauna diversificada, mas poderia ser possível extrair recursos dos pássaros e farmar nos animais dentro das cidades.
A introdução de elementos de RPG, como árvore de habilidades e níveis do personagem, deu uma profundidade que gostei muito.

184859918.review:
Bardzo dobra gra. Gram w nią po raz pierwszy po 7 latach od premiery i naprawdę bardzo przyjemnie się w nią grało. 
Fabuła na całkiem dobrym poziomie, zrozumiała. Spodziewałem się, że jednak będzie dłuższa widząc wielkość mapy. Ledwo 30h mam i grę skończyłem, a wyczyściłem też po drodze jakieś 70% znaków zapytania z całej mapy i kilkudziesięciu zadań pobocznych. Odyssey ukończyłem po ponad 100h, a czyściłem mapę na pewno mniej. Mimo wszystko i tak się świetnie bawiłem.
Same pytajniki i zadania poboczne są niestety powtarzalne jak to w AC bywa. Zawsze to jest znaleźć skarb, znaleźć pergamin albo zabić kapitana i znaleźć skarb w jakimś forcie.

Na mega plus klimat i mapa. Pierwsze sceny na pustyni i pierwsze spojrzenie na piramidy na horyzoncie - mega uczucie. Dosłownie jakby się tam było. Akurat Ubisoft nigdy w tym temacie nie zawodził. Super odzworowane niektóre lokacje czy modele znanych budowli. I rzadko kiedy ktoś mógł przeskoczyć poprzeczkę postawioną przez Ubi  jeśli chodzi o mapy i odwzorowanie. 

Generalnie polecam, 8/10, na wyprzedaży brać od razu i się nawet nie zastanawiać, bo mimo wszystko dziś 250zł to przesada za tą grę.

Our [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/582160/discussions/0/4630358592048884249/]pinned post[/url] in the Steam Discussions explains some of the progress that's already been made and lists a temporary workaround that other players have found useful.

With that said, if you do not have the affected build, we still have some options on how to proceed. There are some troubleshooting steps and workarounds that we should test first to see how much they improve your situation. Let's take the time to work through these now, but note if one stops the issue you're seeing altogether then the rest won't be necessary: 

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Following those steps, if you continue to see this issue, please let our teams know by [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]creating a support case[/url]on the Ubisoft website, listing the steps we've already completed, and then attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]Msinfo and Dxdiag files[/url]in advance. After that has been done, our teams will receive your new support case, review everything, and then contact you directly as soon as they can.

184822775.developer_response:
Hey there, I'm sorry to hear about Assassin's Creed Origins freezing pretty often. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still freezing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184804177.review:
I've played this game in 3 different platforms, and I still think this game is for sure, the best one of all the RPG trilogy and better than a few old AC as well. IMO it ranks high in the series as a whole. I remember how it was very overhated even when wasn't a bad game, and most important, it wasn't a bad Assassin's Creed. Of course, this game has its flags like every other game, things like the "butchered" parkour, some phases of the storytelling, the combat (This one is very relative) or the grinding that for players who aren't used to it can be a real PITA aren't good. But the good things like the excellent voice acting, Bayek, the beautiful world design, the main story, the very good stealth gameplay, and the GREAT, GREAT soundtrack can't be ignored either. It was never the trash game that some nostalgic fans were and still are trying so hard to make it seem. Btw be aware that this game only has some RPG elements, but there is simply no roleplay.

(!) I'm still on the 23H2 windows version so there are not performances issues here, it runs great so far.

184781062.review:
Assassin's Creed Origins no es solo un videojuego, es un viaje épico que redefine lo que significa explorar la historia a través de la lente de la franquicia. Desde el majestuoso Egipto hasta las profundidades del origen de la Hermandad de los Asesinos, el juego marca un renacimiento que establece un nuevo estándar en narrativa, jugabilidad y diseño de mundo abierto.
Un Mundo Vivo y Palpitante

Ubisoft nos transporta al Egipto ptolemaico, un lugar lleno de vida, misterio y cultura. Cada rincón está meticulosamente diseñado: desde las vastas dunas del desierto hasta los bulliciosos mercados de Alejandría y las imponentes pirámides de Giza. Cada paso que damos en este mundo cuenta una historia, ofreciendo una inmersión sin precedentes que establece un referente para futuros títulos de mundo abierto.
Un Sistema de Combate Revolucionado

Origins transforma el combate de la saga con un enfoque más táctico y dinámico, que recompensa la habilidad del jugador. El nuevo sistema de progresión RPG añade profundidad y personalización, permitiéndonos desarrollar a Bayek de acuerdo a nuestro estilo de juego. Esta evolución no solo mejora la experiencia sino que demuestra cómo la serie puede reinventarse manteniendo su esencia.
Una Narrativa Rica y Emotiva

La historia de Bayek, el primer Medjay y cofundador de la Hermandad, es una obra maestra emocional. Su búsqueda de justicia tras una tragedia personal está tejida con delicadeza, conectando al jugador con un protagonista tridimensional. Las relaciones humanas, los dilemas morales y la lucha por un propósito mayor son el núcleo de la narrativa, elevándola a un nivel cinematográfico.
Lecciones para el Futuro

Assassin's Creed Origins es una prueba de que los videojuegos pueden evolucionar sin perder su identidad. Ubisoft ha demostrado cómo la innovación en mecánicas, la narrativa emocional y la inmersión en un mundo rico pueden revitalizar una franquicia. Para el futuro, sería fantástico ver:

    Una expansión de la profundidad emocional y moral en las historias.
    La implementación de más interacciones dinámicas en el mundo abierto.
    El perfeccionamiento del sistema RPG, manteniendo un equilibrio entre personalización y narrativa.
    La exploración de nuevas épocas históricas poco representadas, con la misma autenticidad y detalle.

Conclusión

Assassin’s Creed Origins no solo marcó un antes y un después en la saga, sino que se consagró como un ejemplo de cómo el medio puede contar historias memorables. Es una experiencia que ningún amante de los videojuegos debería perderse, y un recordatorio del potencial de Assassin's Creed para sorprendernos una y otra vez.

Si Origins es el punto de partida para esta nueva etapa de la franquicia, el futuro promete ser simplemente espectacular.

184773808.developer_response:
Hi jimmypancakes2012! I'm so sorry to hear that Assassin's Creed Origins is giving you such a tough time. I'd like to tackle some straightforward troubleshooting steps and some additional workarounds that have proven helpful to others facing similar technical issues. If you haven't already tried them, please do so now as they might save us time, and note if one of these solutions resolves these issues, you won't need to do the rest:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

After the listed steps have been done properly, if these technical issues continue to happen, I would like to collect additional information. If you don't mind, please [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]create a new support case on the Ubisoft website[/url]for this issue to let our teams know it is still occurring. To save time, you can attach your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]to your support case in advance and be sure to confirm all of the troubleshooting steps we did. Once a specialist from our team has reviewed everything, they will follow up with you directly to proceed further. Much appreciated!

184765610.review:
[b] Pontos positivos [/b]
⚬ Possui uma história que te prende no inicio ao fim
⚬ Tem muito conteúdo, com várias sidequests e segredos
⚬ As DLCs adicionam mais a história principal, contando acontecimentos após o jogo base
⚬ O combate é bem fluído e a movimentação na maior parte funciona bem (as vezes buga ou não funciona como deveria)

[b] Pontos negativos [/b]
⚬ Esse jogo aparenta estar mais pesado (ou mau otimizado) do que o Odyssey
⚬ Tive alguns crashes durante minha jogatina, principalmente nas áreas da DLC
⚬ O maior problema que tive foi um bug que o comandante de uma base não spawna, sendo que é necessário matar ele pra conquistar o local (é necessário reiniciar o jogo pra corrigir, bem zuado)

184763537.review:
另一个儿时的梦想 从小最喜欢的系列 自认为是神话三部曲最好的一部 可能后来两部战斗系统越来越好 但是不妨碍这一部才是真的刺客信条 
我不知道以后的刺客信条会变成什么样 单看幻景和影并不足以让我对这一系列抱有期待 或许这个系列 是不应该停一停 沉淀一下 你不是cod 你不需要变成年货 我们需要的是精巧的地图刺杀设计 不同凡响的故事线 我们要刺客信条
我是在ps4上游玩的神话后两部曲 一直没玩第一部 因为我曾经在初中的时候玩了盗版 达到鳄鱼就崩溃了 再也没继续过 所以到今天 他出现在主页 我想起来 还有他没有玩
这一部的战斗是比较简化的 格挡 盾反 闪避  我的操作手感不如剩下的两部 但是他很刺客信条 仍然鼓励玩家刺杀 不会出现奥德赛那样一个军营他妈的躲都躲不了被迫超雄 游戏体量和节奏上也好很多 比奥德赛一地蛇头和sb海战好多了 就是升级系统我一直不是很理解 举个例子 为什么都是1级升到30和29升到三十一个价钱甚至29到三十更贵 不理解 这一部需要升级的需要德拉克马的只有武器 虽然说护甲箭袋一类不抢只能买材料 所以玩到主线结束我没缺钱 甚至是好几把金的角色同等级 反观奥德赛（我不得不喷奥德赛 他浪费我许多时间）我这边武器刮痧 那边海战出海就死  
搜刮钱就积累罪恶值 全城全是通缉我的人 还无限刷 那你杀他们意义在哪 我赶上玩魂了 我活一次刷新一波 不交钱或者杀赞助者都要非常恶心的在做任务的时候频繁被三四个大怪围攻 我玩个jb 我就是去杀那个赞助者 有时候拉一大波仇恨 打也打不过 魂我都能接受 他在磨练我 你这设计 纯纯不想让玩家玩吗不是
总而言之 起源是一次优秀的尝试 我不明白为什么奥德赛能有特别好评 但是 我希望刺客信条越来越好 
不要黑人主角 不要只狼 我想看见那个在巴黎圣母院下的白衣 抑或是他们精神的来源或传承

184758217.developer_response:
Hi Leanaz, I'm sorry to see that Assassin's Creed Origins has become unplayable due to these crashes. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still unable to play your game after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184742402.review:
Ubisoft зробила великий крок уперед із релізом Assassin’s Creed: Origins у 2017 році, і навіть через роки гра залишається привабливим вибором для шанувальників екшен-ігор із відкритим світом. Завдяки продуманому дизайну, глибокому сюжету та неймовірно деталізованому світу, ця частина серії варта уваги у 2025 році.  

 *Ігровий процес* 
У 2025 році ігровий процес Origins відчувається свіжим завдяки реформованій системі бою, яка додає стратегії та динамічності. У порівнянні зі старішими іграми серії, бойова механіка містить елементи RPG із акцентом на вміннях, різноманітті зброї та прокачуванні персонажа.  
Квестова структура теж стала глибшою (але не без погрішностей): побічні місії часто пропонують цікаві історії, що гармонійно вписуються у світ. (На жаль, їх дуже мало. Часто зустрічаються репетативні й нудні місії типу "знайди-принеси-зачисти блокпост")
 
 *Графіка*  
Графіка залишається сильною стороною гри навіть у 2025 році. Завдяки ретельно опрацьованій оптимізації та підтримці високої роздільної здатності на сучасному обладнанні, гра виглядає чудово. Стародавній Єгипет оживає у всій своїй красі: піраміди, пустелі, оазиси та жваві міста дихають життям. HDR і 4K на новітніх екранах ще більше підкреслюють візуальні деталі.  

  *Сюжет і атмосфера*  
Origins пропонує глибоку історію, яка розповідає про витоки Братства Асасинів. Головний герой, Байек, — багатовимірний персонаж, чиє прагнення до помсти переплітається з боротьбою за справедливість. Його історія поєднує сімейну трагедію, політичні інтриги й духовний пошук.  

Світ гри вражає своєю атмосферністю. Ми можемо не лише досліджувати величні пам'ятки Стародавнього Єгипту, але й поринути у релігію, культуру та повсякденне життя тих часів.  

 * Висновок. Чи варто грати в Assasin's Creed: Origins 2025 році?*  
Так, без сумніву. Хоча відтоді вийшли більш сучасні ігри серії (Valhalla, Mirage, Odyssey), Origins залишається дорогоцінною перлиною. Її історія, бойова система та прекрасний відкритий світ гарантують захоплюючий досвід. 

 Тому, якщо ще хтось не досліджував піски Єгипту або хоче зануритися в одну з найкращих історій серії, Assassin’s Creed: Origins у 2025 році — це чудовий вибір.  

*Оцінка: 8/10*
Досі актуальна, атмосферна та захоплююча!

184731882.developer_response:
Hey Anpuu, sorry to hear that you're having a tough time with Assassin's Creed Origins! These troubleshooting steps and workarounds are pretty straightforward but generally help with limiting technical issues like this. Please take the time to complete them now but keep in mind if one step resolves this issue then you won't need to continue with the others:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

If these issues happen again after those steps are done successfully, please follow up and let our teams know by submitting a new support case on the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]Ubisoft website[/url]and be sure to list all of the troubleshooting that we completed to save time. Our technical support team can also review [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]your MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]once they are attached to your case (which you can do in advance). After your case has been received, a specialist will be able to contact you directly to proceed further. Thank you!

184714082.developer_response:
Hey there map4797, I'm terribly sorry to hear about Assassin's Creed Origins freezing on launch. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still freezing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I recommend that you create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184685588.review:
AC Origins is a deeply immersive, well researched game. It's world is a beautifully and richly designed one. For those with a history RPG itch, this game hits the spot! The attention to detail and the amount of consultation that went into the history, languages, culture and architecture of the final Ptolemaic ruler of Egypt, is absolutely astounding. The combat is not as evolved as the following AC titles, but is a great step in that evolution. 
I've sunk over 100 hours into the game and felt compelled to provide a proper review in light of the Win 11 24H2 update. Unfair for blame to be pinned on this game for a Microsoft update problem. It will no doubt be resolved soon enough.

184664732.developer_response:
Hey there AMNEZIA! To cover all our bases, I have some steps and workarounds that are designed to limit technical issues like this and will help with eliminating potential problems in advance. Please take the time to go through them now, but keep in mind that if one method resolves these issues you're seeing, there's no need to proceed with the others:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Once you've completed those successfully if these technical problems continue to occur, please follow up with our support team so that we can look into this further. To do so, login to the Ubisoft website and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]submit a new support case[/url]with your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]attached in advance. In the issue description, please also list the troubleshooting steps that we completed so that our teams are aware of the work we've done and it should save time. Thanks!

184653457.review:
В перше я пройшов Origins за два роки після релізу, і тоді був неймовірно вражений епічним розміром світу і  його красою. Зараз, у 2025, досі найсильніші стороні гри - це ігролад та неймовірний древній Єгирет, кожен куточок якого хочеться досліджувати до останнього камінчика. Також похвалю протагоніста Баєка, який вражає своїм діапазоном емоцій та харизмою.
З мінусів: з часом квести трохи приїдаються, а навколо починаєш помічати все більше Ctrl+C Ctrl+V асетів, тому раджу гру лише тим, хто може закрити очі на такі недоліки. Сюжет стартує потужно, але "тоне" в другій половині гри (про нудні вставки "сучасного світу" краще взагалі не згадувати).

I'd like to tackle some straightforward troubleshooting steps and some additional workarounds that have proven helpful to others facing similar freezing issues. If you haven't already tried them, please do so now as they might save us time, and note if one of these solutions resolves the freezing, you won't need to do the rest:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

After the listed steps have been done properly, if this freezing happens again, I would like to collect additional information. If you don't mind, please [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]create a new support case on the Ubisoft website[/url]for this issue to let our teams know it is still occurring. To save time, you can attach your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]MSinfo and DxDiag files[/url]to your support case in advance and be sure to confirm all of the troubleshooting steps we did. Once a specialist from our team has reviewed everything, they will follow up with you directly to proceed further. Much appreciated!

184609036.review:
[h1]Захватывающее путешествие в древний Египет, полное тайн, интриг и убийств[/h1]

[b]Assassin's Creed Origins - это захватывающая ролевая игра с открытым миром, которая переносит игроков в величественный и загадочный Древний Египет.

Увлекательная история и запоминающиеся персонажи

Origins рассказывает увлекательную историю о Баеке, меджае, который ищет мести за убийство своего сына. По ходу своего путешествия Баек сталкивается с множеством интересных и запоминающихся персонажей, каждый со своими собственными мотивами и целями. Диалоги и сюжетные линии написаны мастерски, погружая игроков в богатый и сложный мир Птолемеевского Египта.

Огромный и захватывающий открытый мир

Мир Origins огромен и невероятно детализирован. Игроки могут исследовать пышные болота Нила, величественные пирамиды Гизы и оживленные города Александрии. Мир наполнен жизнью, с дикими животными, бродячими торговцами и обычными людьми, которые занимаются своими делами.

Улучшенная боевая система

Origins представляет собой значительное улучшение боевой системы серии Assassin's Creed. Бои стали более плавными, динамичными и стратегическими, чем когда-либо прежде. Игроки могут использовать различные виды оружия и способностей, чтобы побеждать врагов, включая скрытные убийства, рукопашный бой и дальний бой.

Глубокая система прокачки

Origins также имеет глубокую систему прокачки, которая позволяет игрокам настраивать стиль игры Баека. Игроки могут улучшать свои навыки, приобретать новые способности и создавать мощное снаряжение, чтобы стать более эффективными убийцами.

Захватывающие побочные квесты и активности

Помимо основной сюжетной линии, Origins предлагает множество увлекательных побочных квестов и дополнительных занятий. Игроки могут охотиться на диких зверей, решать головоломки, участвовать в гонках на колесницах и многое другое. Эти занятия не только обеспечивают дополнительный контент, но и помогают раскрыть богатый и разнообразный мир игры.

Вывод

Assassin's Creed Origins - это превосходная ролевая игра с открытым миром, которая предлагает захватывающую историю, великолепный мир, улучшенную боевую систему и множество контента для изучения. Если вы увлекаетесь историей, приключениями или просто любите отличные игры, то Origins определенно стоит вашего времени.[/b]

184595851.review:
Sendo o primeiro RPG da franquia tem muita coisa que precisaria melhorar (que inclusive foi melhorada nos jogos seguintes), o nivelamento é bem complicado, recomendo que sempre esteja no mínimo no nível dos inimigos pra não passar nervoso.

Vale a pena jogar? Sim, caso pegue o jogo em promoção.

SOBRE A PLATINA

Tive alguns problemas com 3 conquistas que até hoje estão bugadas, precisei fazer um novo jogo + só pra fazer essas 3 conquistas (São da DLC, dá pra rushar mas mesmo assim perdi 2h só pra isso). As demais conquistas só precisa fazer um grind leve, só uma conquista que é chatinha que é onde tem que concluir o mapa inteiro. Então se você estiver lendo isso antes de completar o jogo e quer platinar já vai adiantando essa parte.

184583636.developer_response:
Hi there AangTheGamer! I have several troubleshooting steps that are fairly simple and I'd like to see how much they improve the launching issue you're encountering. To rule out as much as possible, there are also a few workarounds we can test. Please take the time to perform them now but note you won't need to carry out everything if a single method stops the launching problem you're seeing:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

If you work through everything I've listed but Assassin's Creed Origins STILL doesn't launch properly, please don't hesitate to follow up so that our teams can collect more information. If you don't mind helping our investigation, you're able to open a new support case on the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]Ubisoft website[/url] and our teams will be able to follow up with you that way. To speed up the support process, be sure to list all of the steps that were ruled out and attach your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]system files[/url] in advance. Apologies again for the frustration these technical issues have caused, and thank you for helping our teams to look into this further.

Was disappointed that Origins and Valhalla wasn't running on my PC (24H2), origins ran but was hard stuttering every few seconds. Had to reinstall windows back to 23H2 and finally got the game running again. And it is as I remember it. For me, Origins, Odyssey and Black Flag are tied for the best AC games after The Ezio Trilogy. Bayek is a compelling protagonist, in a setting which most definitely is the best rendition of Ancient Egypt thus far. Can't wait to play through the whole game. The only downside is the removal of the Heka Chests so you cannot get microtransaction locked weapons and armors through in game currency anymore. But there are ways around it and if you can get through that, this game is a gem.
