184554567.developer_response:
Hey there Danonze, sorry to hear that you're having a tough time with running Assassin's Creed Origins. Just to check, if you happen to be running Windows 11 Version 24H2, there is an investigation already underway and our teams are working [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]with Microsoft[/url] towards a resolution. There is also a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/582160/discussions/0/4630358592048884249/]pinned post[/url] in the Steam Discussions that lists a temporary workaround and explains some of the progress that's already been made.

If you are NOT using that affected OS build, I recommend completing these troubleshooting steps and tested workarounds next. These are intended to rule out as many possible causes and save us some time. Note that if one does work and stops the issues/bugs that you're seeing then you won't need to perform the rest:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Following those steps, if you continue to see this issue with launching Assassin's Creed Origins, please let our teams know by [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]creating a support case[/url]on the Ubisoft website, listing the steps we've already completed, and then attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]Msinfo and Dxdiag files[/url]in advance. After that has been done, our teams will receive your new support case, review everything, and then contact you directly as soon as they can.

- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)

In the interest of speeding the process us up, be sure to list the steps we tested in the issue description, and you also have the option of attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]system files[/url]in advance. After our team has received your support case, they will be able to review everything and then follow up with you to proceed further.

184527597.review: one of the best ac game. just the best there is

184525735.review:
[h1] Please ignore my playtime here. I played and completed this game on console at release. Just wanted to share my thoughts! [/h1]

Origins is the first to embrace RPG elements, and honestly, I liked the direction. While I love the classic AC games, this new RPG approach was fresh and exciting. The combat is fun, and the map is massive, especially for an AC game at the time. Exploring ancient Egypt was genuinely enjoyable! That said, some areas do feel like filler and lifeless. 

This game isn’t without its flaws. The story is mediocre at best. Unnecessary side quests and the leveling system felt like a chore, especially with the constant need to upgrade your gear. 

But I loved Origins for what it was. It’s not a perfect game, but it’s an ambitious one that laid the groundwork for the RPG-focused Assassin’s Creed games we have today. Do I recommend this game? [b]Oh yeah![/b] Glad I snatched this game during the deep discounts winter sale lol

184467989.developer_response:
Hi there Beighn, sorry to hear that you're running into some freezing! Many players with similar technical issues have noted an improvement after completing some of our troubleshooting steps and testing a few workarounds. If you haven't tried these yet, please take the time to rule them out now, but keep in mind that if one step does stop this issue from happening then the rest won't be necessary: 

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Those steps really should cover all of our bases but if you STILL see any freezing after everything has been completed successfully, please don't hesitate to open a [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]new support case[/url]on the Ubi website and let our teams know so we can continue to help. In the interest of speeding the process us up, be sure to list the steps we tested in the issue description, and you also have the option of attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]system files[/url]in advance. After our team has received your support case, they will be able to review everything and then follow up with you to proceed further.

184464127.review:
This is the most immersed I have ever felt in an Assassin's Creed game, and it benefits greatly from keeping its predecessors at arm's length while still incorporating the better aspects of those games. Bayek of Siwa is one of the best RPG protagonists ever - stoic, formidable, but also at his core just a chill wife guy. I felt myself caring for the characters and their fates far more than I expected.

That is to say nothing of the word. Holy shit, this is possibly the most beautiful and intricate and vast RPG world ever, and the amount of historical research and care that must have gone into it is just astounding. Everything from the cosmopolitan streets of Alexandria to the ancient cities of Thebes and Memphis and the Roman cities of North Africa are all so well realized that you would be forgiven for thinking you are in some sort of 50 bc google street view (where, granted, mercenaries are constantly trying to hunt down and kill you.) If I were a history professor I would gladly put this game up on a projector.

With all this in mind, I am currently struggling to get through Odyssey. I do not care about the protagonist in the way that I cared in Origins, and so even if the world is equally rich, the lazy dialogue and character development has made it a total slog. RPGs are about balancing characters and world building - both need to work in perfect harmony for the game to be compelling enough to play. Origins for me is just a notch below RDR and the Witcher 3 when it comes to games that get this right.

184460744.review:
I haven't played any of the Assassin's games  since Black Flag, so this game felt entirely different from the past ones, especially before you unlock the hidden blade. It took many hours getting used to the new combat system, but I ended up enjoying it . 

I however hate the hidden blade / assassinations in this game. They feel weak, slow, and clunky. I was playing Assassin's Creed 3 earlier in December and it was so much better there, as it also is in other older AC game. I mean, you can't even double assassination in this game. Pretty sad, but maybe they really really wanted this to be the Origin story, so you have to be a weak assassin. 

I was a bit worried on how well Assassin's Creed Shadows was going to turn out compared to Ghost of Tsushima, but after playing this, I think if they keep the Origins formula but give it the proper improvements. Shadows should turn out to be a great game.

184452068.review:
Assassin’s Creed Origins – the game that traded its classic stealth-action roots for an action-RPG makeover. Was it worth it? Well, let’s just say it’s... fine. Not great, not terrible. Just fine.

The first thing that stood out to me was the story. Or rather, how tired I am of the revenge plot. [spoiler]Yes, your son gets killed.[/spoiler] Yes, you’re mad. Yes, you go on a roaring rampage of revenge. But honestly? I didn’t care. Maybe you need to be a parent [spoiler]to truly understand the pain of losing a child, let alone one who you accidentally killed yourself.[/spoiler] But me? I just couldn’t bring myself to care about Bayek or his tragedy. Sorry, buddy.

Then there are the quests. They’re middle-of-the-road, neither amazing nor abysmal, just… there. You fetch, you fight, you repeat. And while the world is vast and undeniably beautiful in places – shoutout to Alexandria for being a true highlight – much of the map feels like a giant sandbox of empty towns, boring oases, and endless dunes. It’s as if Ubisoft wanted to make The Witcher 3 but forgot to include half the life and charm.

Speaking of charm, let’s talk combat. This is where the RPG influence really kicks in, with heavy and light attacks, plus bows that come in different flavors but mostly do the same thing. Honestly, the fighting feels like a downgrade compared to older AC games. Remember when the hidden blade was an instant kill? Yeah, good times. Here, it’s more of a slightly annoyed blade. And stealth? Stripped down and simplified. Social stealth? Gone. You’re basically a warrior in a hoodie now.

And then there’s the sound design. Oh boy. If you have headphones that cost more than €50, prepare to be disappointed. The audio quality is atrocious. Dialogue sounds like it was recorded in a tin can, ambient noise is flat, and the whole soundscape just feels cheap. I get it – maybe they were trying to save space on this massive game. But was it worth sacrificing quality? Nope. Not even close.

At the end of the day, Assassin’s Creed Origins left me with mixed feelings. It’s a bold experiment for the series, but one that doesn’t always pay off. Fans of the franchise should give it a try, if only to see the direction Ubisoft took with it. But newcomers? You might have a completely different experience – for better or worse.

So, is Origins worth your time? That depends. If you’re here for a vast map and don’t mind trading a great story and stealth for a lot of sand and RPG elements, go for it. Just don’t expect it to live up to the glory days of Ezio and co.

184449940.review:
Если воспринимать игру, как адаптацию исторических событий 1ого века до н.э. через историю главного героя то игра очень хорошая. Очень красивый мир, одинокие пустыни, многолюдные греческие и египетские города, древняя архитектура, взаимодействие животных - годнота. 
Наполнение этого мира, вот это кал. Сто тысяч аванпостов и сокровищ под охраной. Одни Гробницы разумеется кайф.
Грустная сюжетная арка между Байеком и его женой. Насколько им хочется быть друг с другом и все же они отказываются от своих прошлых жизней становясь незримыми. Дайте больше времени на раскрытие героев и их проблем, сюжет считался бы не хуже многих признанных тайтлов. 
Стелс не играбельный, игра задизайнена под отркытый бой.

184447803.developer_response:
Hi there traueasy! Crashes are super frustrating and I'm sorry to hear that they're keeping you from playing. To cover all our bases, I have some steps and workarounds that are designed to limit technical issues like this and will help with eliminating potential problems in advance. Please take the time to go through them now, but keep in mind that if one method resolves this crashing problem that you're running into, there's no need to proceed with the others:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Following those steps, if you continue to see this crashing issue, please let our teams know by [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]creating a support case[/url]on the Ubisoft website, listing the steps we've already completed, and then attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]Msinfo and Dxdiag files[/url]in advance. After that has been done, our teams will receive your new support case, review everything, and then contact you directly as soon as they can.

It is a very good game for historical experience, one of the very few games that allow me to enjoy the beautiful landscape of ancient egypt and its life. The downside is mainly animation, especially this is a sequel to Assassin Creed Unity. For example, despite environment is quite visually well done, how come the main character animation is worse than Assassin Creed 1 which is a 2007 game. Even worse is that, this is a sequel to Assassin Creed Unity, in which is the game that has the best and smoothest animation all around in all Assassin Creed Series. How come this game act as sequel from Assassin Creed Unity downgrade their animation quality. Strange as heck.

Bought the game including season pass on sale. It simply does not launch. At first even the initial loading screen freezes, but after trying to implement some fixes this was fixed. All good you would think? Nope, now the game freezes upon trying to load it's assets. 

Seems to be a relatively common problem when looking for it online. No apparent fixes communicated from Ubisoft. Unfortunately I was only able to get a refund on the game, not the DLC through Steam rules. I would not advise buying the game.

184422037.review:
This is a good game, but Ubisoft Connect is a CANCER. I just had my couch play experience ruined by having to go and input again a password I HAD ALREADY ENTERED BEFORE. I used the Steam keyboard think with PS button + square, but then it asked me to access my email to get a 2FA code. Why the fuck is Ubisoft actively ruining the experience of games on PC? This really fucking aggravates me because I had only so many minutes to play before going out somewhere, and I have to deal with this fucking bullshit. Fuck Ubisoft, I hope they finally go bankrupt this year after finally canceling AC Samurai or whatever the hell they're calling that stupid game.

I think it undermines Valve's own credibility as a company to let other companies release games in their storefront that require third-party accounts in order for the games to be accessible.

Valve should completely and permanently ban games that require third-party accounts and any kind of launchers that block access to games you bought on their storefront. If I bought a game from Valve, it's between me and Valve. Games that do require some kind of account should use my Steam account through Steam's APIs, and nothing else. Anything even slightly deviating from this is unacceptable and a cancer to consumers that will eventually kill the video games industry.

184375147.developer_response:
Hello Piano Smile! Many players with similar technical issues have noted an improvement after completing some of our troubleshooting steps and testing a few workarounds. If you haven't tried these yet, please take the time to rule them out now, but keep in mind that if one step does stop this issue from happening then the rest won't be necessary: 

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Following those steps, if you continue to see this issue when trying to play Assassin's Creed Origins, please let our teams know by [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]creating a support case[/url]on the Ubisoft website, listing the steps we've already completed, and then attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]Msinfo and Dxdiag files[/url]in advance. After that has been done, our teams will receive your new support case, review everything, and then contact you directly as soon as they can.

184354964.review: It feels nothing like AC, however environment, game and sound design, graphics are top-notch perfect imo. For the feels alone this game is worth buying

184354616.review:
UBISOFT AO MESMO TEMPO IMPRESSIONA E DECEPCIONA

Assassin's Creed Origins é ambientado no Antigo Egito onde vivemos um momentos na vida de Bayek (protagonista), um medjai da era Ptolomaica (Ptolemy XIII Theos Philopator). Após eventos trágicos após ser traido pelos seus superiores Bayek ingressa - juntamente com sua cônjuge Aya - em busca de vingança. Em paralelo, no presente, jogamos com a nova protagonista Layla Hassan, uma funcionária da Abstergo tentando provar o seu valor ao mesmo tempo que está prestes a descobrir que talvez não esteja no lado certo dessa história a qual está investigando: o passado de Bayek.

A história é parcialmente contada através de flashbacks pontuais ao compasso que vamos eliminando nossos alvos. Infelizmente a narrativa é mau contada, confusa e peca no desenvolvimento dos personagens secundários. Há pouca profundidade nos personagens auxiliares, sendo que alguns deles aparecem DO NADA com pouca explicação e interagem com Bayek como já estivessem na narrativa há temposç deixando o jogando com uma sensação de: TE CONHEÇO PORR??? NUNCA VI MAIS GORDO/A. Não somente a narrativa é mau contada, mas também o desenvolvimento do vilão é digno de PENA, é absolutamente jogado e FRAQUISSÍMO, causando a impressão que o roteirista estava próximo de entrar de recesso ou de férias e escreveu qualquer coisa para finalizar a história. Sério, o pior vilão da franquia até agora DE LONGE.

O jogo - como todo jogo da Ubisoft - é carregado de missões secundárias para dizer que muitas horas de gameplay, como: liberar acampamentos, resolver enigmas, derrotar capitães de navios, saquear tumbas, pontos de sincronização, lutas no Colisseu, corridas no Hipódromo, explorar lugares submersos, derrotar elefantes em uma arena de batalha - e aqui eu preciso ressaltar o quão ESTÚPIDO é esse tipo de atividade, eu não sei quem foi o imbecil que achou que isso seria um tipo de atividade interessante, esse lixo de atividade é basicamente um luta repetitiva com você tem que lutar com um elefante gigante que tem um moveset nojento de roubado enquanto desvia ao mesmo tempo de flechas e bombas jogadas pelos inimigos montados no elefante, atividade estúpida que algum game designer mesquinho achou que seria legal fazer o jogador passar raiva com esse lixo - , tem uma atividade na qual você alinha as constelações estelares, lugares eremitas que você só tem que achar um tapete pra ficar 1min sentado meditando ( tipo, foda-se, qualquer coisa essa atividade ), liberar fortes, etc.

Por mais que pareça muuuito diversificados os tipos de atividades, após um tempo, acaba se tornando repetitiva a gameplay pois as mesmas estão presentes em quantidade excessiva em um mapa relativamente grande. Para quem tem foco em aproveitar o máximo do jogo, o mesmo se torna extremamente repetitivo.

Tirando essa parte de lado, um clássico de qualquer jogo da Ubisoft, preciso salientar que a nova mecânica de combate me agradou. Particularmente gosto do gênero RPG e, após jogar muuuuuuitos jogos da franquia, posso dizer que a nova mecânica - embora muito diferente - não me incomodou e, creio que até esse jogo, não perdeu em sua totalidade, o stealth. Assassin's Creed Origins traz elementos de RPG, adotando um combate mais cauteloso, composição de itens de equipamento, progressão de nível do personagem, aquisição de pontos de habilidade, etc. Tais elementos aderem ao título um grau de complexidade bem-vindo. Mas nada muuuuito difícil de compreender. O jogo, como em títulos anteriores, possui um sistema de criação de itens de equipamento no qual precisamos adquirir recursos como madeira, ferro, pele de animais, dentre outros para melhorar a qualidade dos equipamentos do Bayek.

As DLC's OK, se passando após os eventos da história principal. Hidden Ones conta a história diretamente após os eventos da campanha principal, dando um "final definitivo" para a jornada de Bayek ( nada muito emocionante ), nem consigo me lembrar se traz alguma mecânica nova de gameplay. Tirando o final, um conteúdo beeem esquecível. The Cruse of the Pharaohs é a mais interessante das DLC's explorando um trecho na história de Bayek onde ele irá investigar uma maldição que está assombrando a cidade de Tebas e trazendo múmias de volta à vida. Nela teremos a oportunidade de explorar tumbas de grandes faraós e adentrar em mundos do pós-vida. Esse conteúdo também traz um novo item que permite criar melhores equipamentos para o Bayek.

A ambientação do jogo é ESPETACULAR! Isso a Ubisoft raramente decepciona. Amantes de história como eu ficarão maravilhados em poder visitar cidades famosas como Tebas, Mênfis, Alexandria, Siuá, dentre outras e poder vivenciar um pouco de como seria a vida dos egípcios, gregos e romanos na epóca. Não só isso, mas ao invés de ter o conteúdo histórico em simples textos, agora o jogo conta com uma reprodução do mesmo mapa da campanha com trechos comentados por narradores relatando fatos históricos, como se fosse um simulador de história, ISSO É UM DOS MELHORES ASPECTOS PARA AMANTES DE HISTÓRIA NESSE TÍTULO! Estes tais denomidos "passeios" seriam como se você estivesse em um documentário simulator dentro do mapa do jogo, e irão relatar fatos sobre a cultura egípcia, romanos, pirâmides, dentro outros.

Ao decorrer das minhas 122h de gameplay infelizmente, por um período de tempo, tive diversos crashes ( jogo fechando repentinamente ), porém ao final das minhas ~30h tais crashes não ocorreram mais. Creio que tenha sido devido algum patch que foi consertado posteriormente.

Em suma, Assassin's Creed Origins tem uma história mau narrada e confusa, com uma nova personagem no presente Layla Hassan ( que sinceramente eu quase esqueci de escrever sobre ao ponto que eu cheguei nessa parte da minha review - vou adicionar um comentário sobre no parágrafo o qual comento sobre a história ) pouco cativante, um vilão "principal" ridículo, uma mecânica de gameplay que traz um ar fresco para a franquia com um alto índice de atividades extremamente repetitivas, 1 de 2 DLC's que é realmente interessante. Para amantes de história, se deparar ao longo da gameplay com o modo de vida egípcio ou interagir com grandes figuras históricas do final do Antigo Egito, é sensacional.  Caso você esteja esperando algo que vai te surpreender nessa nova história da franquia, está no lugar errado, porém, caso queira descobrir mais sobre o modo de vida egípcio e seja um amante de história, talvez esse título possa suprir essa necessidade. Mas se esse for o caso, não é melhor você ver um documentário ou comprar um livro ao invés talvez de pagar muito caro nesse jogo? Caso ache uma boa promoção, vá sem medo, mas só se estiver em uma promoção mesmo!

No fim, o dinheiro é seu, mas após você "comprar" o jogo lembre-se, ele NÃO É SEU, VOCÊ APENAS ESTÁ PAGANDO PELO DIREITO DE JOGAR. Lembre-se disso :)

In the event that one step does stop this freezing problem with Assassin's Creed Origins, then you won't need to finish the rest:

- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]

- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

After you've gotten through the listed steps, if this freezing with Assassin's Creed Origins continues to happen, please [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]create a new support case[/url]on the Ubi website. Once a member of our support team has received your case, they will review everything and then follow up with you directly to proceed further.

184327719.review:
Assassin’s Creed Origins was developed using Ubisoft's AnvilNext 2.0 engine, and I expected to see scenes filled with crowded, improved AI characters alongside the important story of how the Assassin Brotherhood began. Unfortunately, it fails to meet expectations.

Ancient Egypt seems exciting at first. However, the endless deserts and flat landscapes quickly become monotonous. One of the best aspects of Assassin’s Creed is climbing tall buildings to enjoy breathtaking views. In Origins, though, the highest points are mud houses and pyramids with slopes around a 45-degree angle. Without the thrill of exploring towering structures, the world feels somewhat underwhelming.

The story, which focuses on the birth of the Assassin Order, comes across as shallow and rushed. It had the potential to be a powerful and emotional journey but falls flat. Instead of engaging storytelling, the game relies heavily on numerous side quests. These tasks often feel repetitive and exist more to stretch the game’s playtime than to add meaningful content.

If you’re interested in Egyptian mythology and culture, Origins might still offer some enjoyment. However, for long-time fans seeking a standout entry in the series, the +150 hour grind feels unnecessary. Other Assassin’s Creed titles do a far better job of capturing the essence of the franchise.

184322398.review:
World/Setting - 8/10
Music - 7/10
Story - 6/10
Gameplay - 6/10

Overall Rating - 6.5/10
One Line Review - Assassin's creed, but not really!

World/Setting
It's ancient Egypt... Should I say more!

Yesterday I was trying to watch some gameplay of Delta Force, the new one. But I guess the algorithm really did not get the memo, that there is a new Delta Force game, because the first video that popped up : old Delta Force game, and I kid you not, the mission setting: Giza; The pyramids you could see in the distance. And that got me thinking, if I had told a kid from that time, that one day you would be able to visit those Pyramids in the distance, and not only would you be able to climb it, you would be able to go inside it, that kid would have probably laughed. And yet here we are, 20 years later, being able to visit the Pyramids; climb it; walk around it; walk inside it; admire it. And that, I think, the coolest thing this game was able to achieve.

Music
It was very good. Catchy! And a little somber too. It fits the setting.

Story
The story, to be honest, was above average, and most of all : Predictable. I do not want to give away anything, related to story, but I could not give a flying f**k about the story. I found Bayek to be very interesting though, but his story was not as good as it could have been. And I would blame it on the writers for this. I just did not like the framing of the story, that's all. A linear story, quit literally, in a open would game is a wasted opportunity.

Gameplay
Oh boy... where do i begin!? My one line review pretty much summarizes the game: Assassin's creed, but not really! If this game was not connected to the Assassin's creed series, I think it would have been better. I would have at least respected Ubisoft for trying to do something original. But by attaching this to one of my favourite series, I will scrutinize it and compare it to previous titles. And this is where my praise for this game ends, because this is not an Assassin's creed game. It feels like an imposter. Practically every thing has been changed about this game from previous Assassin's creed titles. And I did not like it. I gave it a good rating, because it does, what it is supposed to do, well. But it does those things: above average.
Here are some examples:
1. The bare bones rpg.
2. Repetitive side missions. It's not Assassin's creed's fault. It's Ubisoft's fault. All their games suffer from this.
3. Predictable story.
4. Bland combat. And also it's not fluid, not at all.
5. All the blending mechanics: gone!
6. Tail missions, eavesdrop missions. I know every one hated it. But I can bet everyone hated the over use of it. Not the type of mission itself, because it is something an assassin would do in real life.

I can go on and one, but that will turn into a rant. And I have always believed, you should experience the product yourself before making a decision.

184303134.review:
游戏整体怎么样我现在无法评价，你看我的游戏时间。这个游戏我买了并且玩了一会儿，才发现它跟我想象中的不太一样，于是就不想玩了。（只是我不感兴趣，游戏应该是不错的）

虽然这是动作游戏，但它跟其他的动作游戏不一样。其他的攻击的是怪物，此游戏攻击的是活生生的人（虽然是凶残的敌人），要用武器，攻击的过程比较血腥，你想想看能不能接受（我就接受不了才不愿再玩的）。
操作方面，整体来说有点一般，手感不太流畅，躲避攻击，防御，攻击，蓄力，移动等，这些组合起来（你战斗的时候当然是又攻又守）不够丝滑，比优秀的动作游戏差很多。
难度我不太好说。能选择难度，有极难的难度。但是因为手感的问题，你不一定能稳定发挥。（我就是这样）

剧情：不清楚整体怎么样，因为我没怎么玩。我只能说主角挺伟大也很英勇，与压榨人民的凶残一方作斗争。

（游戏包含的）埃及的文化：令人震撼，建筑风格，人物衣着细节很丰富，都是埃及风格。有文字，壁画什么的，你可以仔细看。但这些真不真实我就不知道了。但是，这些只是本游戏的背景，并非主体，主体是动作！！！所以你要是只对其包含的文化感兴趣，请万分谨慎地考虑后再购买，而且注意你的游戏时间别超过2小时。

别像我一样不太能接受战斗时的血腥（我高兴不起来），并且只是看重游戏包含的文化因素（想见识一下）就买了还玩了，结果发现根本不是自己想的那样......呜呜呜我的钱啊！

为什么不提示下坐骑的要按的键？游戏的选项-控制处没有标出此操作的按键（是长按B），让玩家因为这个卡关，就？？？

184300317.developer_response:
Hi CaptainRex, sorry to hear that Assassin's Creed Origins is freezing on you like this! I have several troubleshooting steps that are fairly simple and I'd like to see how much they improve the issue you're encountering. To rule out as much as possible, there are also a few workarounds we can test. Please take the time to perform them now but note you won't need to carry out everything if a single method stops the freezing:

- Installing Assassin's Creed Origins on the same SSD as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect is the ideal configuration
- [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]Verify the game files[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-background-applications-on-pc/000063761]Clean boot[/url] will rule out any background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (steering wheels and pedals, streaming equipment, additional monitors, VR equipment, etc.)
- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Following the steps listed above, if you STILL get any freezing or if you need help with anything else, please don't hesitate to open a [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]new support case[/url]on the Ubisoft website so that our teams can assist you further. To save as much time as possible and limit steps being repeated, be sure to list the steps that we tested and then attach your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]system files[/url]to your support case in advance. Once a specialist from our team has received your support case, they will review the contents and then contact you directly to proceed with more steps and solutions.

- Clear the [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6ad7-820d-8be5-e51f]Steam cache[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]All steps listed in the FAQ article[/url]
- [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Perform a SFC Scan[/url] (if errors are detected, repeat the scan until all results are clear)
- [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170]Clean reinstall the C++ supporting software[/url]

Those steps really should cover all of our bases but if you STILL get any crashes after everything has been completed successfully, please don't hesitate to open a [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/contact]new support case[/url]on the Ubi website and let our teams know so we can continue to help. In the interest of speeding the process us up, be sure to list the steps we tested in the issue description, and you also have the option of attaching your [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-system-reports-to-help-troubleshooting/000061449]system files[/url]in advance. After our team has received your support case, they will be able to review everything and then follow up with you to proceed further.

184234605.review:
Assassin's Creed Origins is an action-adventure RPG developed by Ubisoft and released in October 2017. It serves as a prequel to the Assassin's Creed series, exploring the origins of the Assassin Brotherhood. Set in Ancient Egypt during the reign of Cleopatra, the game introduces a reimagined open-world experience, RPG mechanics, and a rich historical narrative.

Key Features:
1. Expansive Open World
Explore a vast and beautifully recreated Ancient Egypt, including cities like Alexandria and Memphis, as well as deserts, oases, and the Nile River.
Dynamic weather and day-night cycles enhance immersion.
2. Engaging Storyline
Follow the journey of Bayek of Siwa, a Medjay (protector of Egypt), who seeks revenge for his son’s death.
Witness the birth of the Assassin Brotherhood and uncover political conspiracies involving Cleopatra, Julius Caesar, and Ptolemy XIII.
3. RPG Elements
Level up through XP-based progression, unlocking skills in a skill tree divided into Warrior, Hunter, and Seer branches.
Collect and upgrade weapons, shields, and gear, including rare and legendary items.
Craft materials to enhance equipment and abilities.
4. Revamped Combat System
Features a more fluid and dynamic hitbox-based combat system compared to earlier Assassin's Creed games.
Utilize a variety of weapons, bows, and shields while mastering dodging, blocking, and parrying mechanics.
Battle powerful bosses and mythological creatures.
5. Exploration and Side Activities
Engage in treasure hunts, puzzles, gladiator arenas, chariot racing, and tomb explorations.
Solve mysteries hidden in ancient ruins and uncover secrets about Egyptian mythology.
Control Senu, Bayek’s eagle, to scout areas, mark enemies, and find objectives.
6. Historical Accuracy and Discovery Tour Mode
Dive into detailed historical settings and meet iconic figures such as Cleopatra and Julius Caesar.
Discovery Tour Mode (added later) allows players to explore Ancient Egypt as a combat-free educational experience.
Why It Stands Out:
Origins reinvented the Assassin’s Creed series by focusing more on RPG gameplay mechanics and exploration, appealing to fans of open-world adventures.
Its stunning visuals, attention to historical detail, and compelling storyline make it one of the most beloved entries in the franchise.
Ideal For:
Fans of historical narratives and mythology.
Players who enjoy open-world RPGs with rich exploration and side quests.
Longtime Assassin’s Creed fans looking for a fresh experience with deeper RPG elements.

184221825.developer_response:
Hey there, I'm sorry to hear about these frequent issues you've encountered with Assassin's Creed Origins. If you're using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help improve your situation overall:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still dealing with these technical issues after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184219317.review:
Первая игра из мифической трилогии. Это был глоток свежего воздуха для франшизы. Прекрасный, красивый, наполненный и что самое главное живой открытый мир, где есть разный контент записки и т.д. 

Выделю очень хороший сюжет про главного героя Байека. Он потерял сыны и пытается жить новой жизнью, неплохо рассказали о становлении братства (вызвало даже мурашки). Гемплей был интересен. 

Из минусов выделю скомканная концовка, РПГ моменты (жалкий клон Ведьмака 3), под конец становится душно зачищать все вопросики и локации. И главный минус это второе дополнение про фараонов - такая дичь!!! Не советую её играть!

184151010.developer_response:
Hey there, I'm sorry to hear about Assassin's Creed Origins crashing pretty often. If you are using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still having issues launching your game after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184118458.review:
我叫巴耶克，埃及最后的守护者，无形者的先驱。

我曾先后失去过一个儿子和两个妻子。

我最大的敌人不是罗马，也非杀子仇人胡狼，而是问号。

我因四处行侠仗义而备受人民爱戴，每当我赶路时，总会有好心人将他们的船和马送给我。

当然，还有不少戴红色头盔的家伙以我为目标，誓死追随我的脚步。

职责所在，我不仅时常拆除路边的违章建筑，还要对金字塔的文物，以及别人的宝箱进行发掘和回收。

众所周知，皇冠代表着领导者，是军营的最高荣誉，但士兵们对得到此嘉奖似乎颇为抵触？也许这就是能力越大，风险越大吧。

每当我深入军营，看到将士们露宿风餐、和衣而睡时，总是忍不住将油壶放到他们身边，并用箭为其生火，尽管从来没有人对我说过一句谢谢，但我并不介怀。

看到他们将死去的战友扛起去安葬，我不禁感慨生死无常，遂默默将路边尸体埋入草丛，至于为什么会有尸体，别问。

这就是我，锡瓦巴耶克的日常。你说我为何不在名字前冠以埃及？你念念不就知道了。

184099892.review:
[h1]Game [b]#55[/b] of My Backlog Clearing Journey[/h1] 
[b]Status:[/b]  Completed

AC Origins feels timeless to me and stands out as one of the best franchise revivals in recent years.  Bayek’s character development, the way the story unfolds, and the incredible attention to detail in the world design are major highlights. The game does an amazing job of capturing the atmosphere of ancient Egypt, making it feel truly immersive. However, as an RPG, it stumbles in a few areas—like being unable to defeat enemies just a few levels higher and forcing players into grinding through side quests that often feel bland and uninspired (classic Ubisoft).  

That said, as the starting point for the series’ RPG evolution, this is the best place to begin.

184098191.review:
Assassin’s Creed Origins é um jogo excelente que trouxe uma revitalização muito bem-vinda à franquia, especialmente com a introdução de elementos de RPG. Essa mudança trouxe uma nova profundidade à série, algo que realmente me agradou.

Os cenários são espetaculares e imersivos. Passei horas explorando o deserto, apenas apreciando as paisagens deslumbrantes e me deixando levar pela atmosfera única do Egito Antigo. A exploração do mapa é extremamente divertida e instigante, sempre oferecendo algo novo para descobrir.

O sistema de combate é variado, dependendo do tipo de arma que você escolhe, o que adiciona uma camada estratégica às batalhas. No entanto, um ponto fraco do jogo é o sistema de níveis, que pode parecer desbalanceado. Por exemplo, lutar contra um inimigo de nível mais alto — como um nível 25 enquanto você está no nível 20 — muitas vezes se torna frustrante, quase como enfrentar um chefe de Dark Souls.

A narrativa é envolvente e bem construída, com protagonistas marcantes e cativantes. Bayek e Aya são personagens memoráveis, que carregam a história com força e carisma.

Em resumo, Assassin’s Creed Origins é uma experiência que vale muito a pena. Seja pela jogabilidade, pela ambientação ou pela história, é um jogo que entrega uma aventura épica e envolvente.

184084176.developer_response:
Hey there Fathan2020, I'm sorry to hear about Assassin's Creed Origins freezing and preventing you from enjoying the game. If you or anyone else are using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help reduce the amount of technical issues you encounter:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still freezing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184045615.review:
Assassin's Creed Origins is a masterpiece that revitalizes the Assassin's Creed franchise. Set in ancient Egypt, the game offers a breathtaking open world filled with stunning landscapes, detailed cities, and vibrant wildlife. The attention to historical accuracy and cultural richness makes it an immersive experience.

The combat system has been overhauled, providing a more dynamic and challenging approach. The RPG elements, such as leveling up, skill trees, and gear customization, add depth to the gameplay and make progression feel rewarding. Bayek, the protagonist, is a well-written and relatable character whose journey is both emotional and compelling.

The story is engaging, with a mix of personal revenge and the broader political intrigue surrounding the origins of the Assassin Brotherhood. Side quests are meaningful and often tied to the world, adding layers of narrative and exploration.

However, the game is not without flaws. Some missions can feel repetitive, and occasional technical bugs may disrupt the experience. Despite these minor setbacks, Assassin's Creed Origins remains a must-play for fans of the series and newcomers alike.

184015570.review:
UPDATE:

Ubisoft released an update/ fix for the 24H2 problem!  All of what I said below, I will leave it for posterity.  BUT, now I can truly play the game and see what it's all about.  I played for about a half hour so far, and not one freeze or glitch during gameplay.  There was... an issue after I exited the game with my system freezing up and requiring a hard reboot... but I'm willing to chalk that up to happenstance at this time.  If that persists, I'll be back to update this again.

For now... as of 2025.01.15, the game works!  Now, I'll actually be able to review the game.

Kudos on the progress Ubisoft.

***

Initial review:

I bought this back in July, got busy and never installed.  I didn't know about the 2 week refund rule from Steam.  Live and learn.  I thought it was only tied to play time.  My mistake.  (I only ran this game for a few minutes before I saw that it was unplayable.)

So - I finally got around to installing the game today, and to my dismay, it freezes every ten seconds, even on the cut scenes.  I have played AC Odyssey for close to 200 hours, and never had a hiccup - so it was very surprising to see Origins have such a problem.

I suspect it is due to the Windows 11 24H2 update, but I cannot be certain (I've read others with similar 24H2 issues, and Microsoft surely takes part of the blame here.  What a botched update!!).  Nevertheless, I am definitely not nuking my system and going back to 23H2 just for this game.

It's a shame - I was really looking forward to exploring ancient Egypt.

I would recommend NOT buying this game at ANY price until Ubisoft confirms a fix.  I have heard rumors that they won't be doing any more support for it... which is astounding.

In that event, I will not buy a single thing from Ubisoft ever again, seeing as their support only extends so far.

Prove us wrong Ubisoft.  Fix your game and maybe we will try some of your other games.

Additionally, I won't be buying Steam games in advance any more.  I have a bunch in my cart for the Winter sale now, but now that I know the two week rule is a thing, I'll just hold off until I am ready to install and play.

183993407.review:
Oh boy, strap yourselves in because Assassin’s Creed Origins is like a history lesson with a side of epic. If you’ve ever wanted to sneak around ancient Egypt like a parkour-loving Cleopatra, this game is your passport to mythical adventures and a little bit of sand in your shoes. Right off the bat, this game hits you with its gorgeous graphics. I mean, you can’t throw a stone without hitting a stunning pyramid or a beautifully animated camel. Seriously, the landscapes are so beautiful they make you want to take up ancient photography. This isn’t just a game; it’s an interactive postcard from your time-traveling Aunt Mildred who insists she’s riding a sphinx somewhere in Giza.

But wait—hold onto your pyramids—because it’s not just about the pretty views. The story in Origins is full of twists, turns, and enough drama to make a soap opera seem like a children’s bedtime story. You play as Bayek, a Medjay who can parkour better than your cousin Greg on a sugar rush. He’s out for revenge, justice, and maybe a snack from time to time. The way he slices through enemies with finesse and an alarming level of agility almost makes you want to take up sword training (note: please don’t). It’s like The Mummy meets Gladiator, with a pinch of that signature Ubisoft humor sprinkled in.

Of course, the pièce de résistance of Assassin’s Creed Origins is its combat system, revamped and more engaging than ever. Imagine dancing with swords, but the kind of dance where your enemies end up with a lot less health and a lot more wearing of terra firma. The skill tree is packed with interesting abilities, which means you can customize Bayek into the ancient assassin of your dreams—whether your dream assassin uses sneaky tactics or prefers charging in with flashy weapons. It’s like they handed you an ancient buffet and said, “Go on, make your perfect warrior.” And believe me, you will.

And now, for something really special: the Discovery Tour mode. Have you ever dreamed of wandering Egypt, learning its history without the pesky daggers and conspiracies? Well, Origins delivers with this educational treasure trove. Instead of stabbing baddies, you stroll through ancient landmarks, soaking up historical facts that make you sound smart at parties. It’s as if Ubisoft decided we need a bit of education to go with our digital escapades, a neat little feature that entertains and informs in equal measure. So yes, if you adore open-world adventures where history slides in with epic storytelling and stunning visuals, grab a copy of Assassin’s Creed Origins. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who loves the genre. You’ll love every pyramid-climbing, hieroglyph-decoding moment!

183963506.developer_response:
Hey Pesi, I'm truly sorry to hear about this crash you've encountered with Assassin's Creed Origins. If you are using the Windows 11 24h2 build, I can confirm that crashing problem has already been reported for investigation and our teams are already working with [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-24h2#3448msgdesc]Microsoft[/url] to figure out a resolution.

If you're not using Windows 11 24h2 build, I'd like to provide some troubleshooting to help limit how often these crashes occur:

- Ensure Assassin's Creed Origins is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000064837]Update Graphics Drivers[/url]
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still crashing after you've completed the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

每次都是，想了很多，到写下的时候，总是不知道说什么。
  第一次看到是在4年级的时候，那时候就被深深吸引住了，挺想玩的，那时候不知道什么stm，以为像什么4399上的游戏，在浏览器里搜着，找着，看到那种小网站的300多的价格吓住了，不过，就选当时买了，设备上也带不动，最后只能望而却步，只是在那个小小少年的脑海，留下浓墨。
  现在，我高二，冬促，黄金版也就40几，买了，玩了，就玩了一个多小时吧，可能是我没什么耐心玩rpg游戏，又或是其他的，没什么意思，就退款了，我不知道为什么，呆呆的坐在电脑前，沉默，我总是觉得，我现在相较于多年前，总是少了点什么，以前我有一个游戏一口气玩300多小时的激情，现在，玩个几分钟，就没有玩下去的动力了，大抵，可能是我累了吧感觉什么都没干，就挺累的，想过很多次这种感觉，每次想到这，总是失意万分，我知道，我的人生，少了激情，passion，每天在学校，感觉什么都没干，一周就过去了，每天做着一模一样的事，我知道时间拂过我的身边，我可以很清晰的感受到他的流失，但我无能为力，无能为力的感受它的离去，我知道，我应该做出什么改变这一切，但每次要开始的时候，总是有各种的事情来击破我的决心，又或是我粗糙的耐心。
  就像是这篇文章一样，我不知道下面写什么，每次都是，想了很多，到写下的时候，总是不知道说什么。

Finally! The 24H2 issue is fixed. It took a long time, but thank you for not neglecting this issue.
-----

My Windows has already been updated to 24H2 for 10 days, so I can't roll back to 23H2, and Microsoft only officially provides 24H2 installers. It seems like they have no plans to provide 23H2 again, and Ubisoft is focusing solely on new games. NO ONE is providing a solution.

183900271.review:
I was really looking forward to playing this game... I'm a huge AC fan, started with the original, the Ezio trilogy, and so on...
I wasn't able to play this game until recently when I finally built a new PC. To my surprise the game was on winter sale and I bought the deluxe edition.

It is completely unplayable, I passed the first mission and the moment I arrive in Siwa, the game freezes, the audio still continues to play, and the game does not crash, it just freezes, and I cannot do anything besides ending the task in task manager... Other people keep saying that this is in issue specific to Windows 11. Apparently it is true, and unfortunately, it is impossible to play and enjoy the game.

The loading time of the game is incredibly slow, the CPU is not at all utilized, nor the speed of the NVME drive on which the game is installed. 

Keeps changing the resolution of the game many times during launch and load, freezing and unfreezing on white background. When I finally get to play the game, it completely freezes when entering Siwa territory.

This is very sad, I was really looking forward to it, but I will have to request a refund until they can patch this...

183853607.review:
继巴黎人民的热性淳朴后，我来到心中一直向往的古埃及跟随历史上的著名人物进行一段史诗级探险。
精致唯美的美术设计，壁画、文献、日志、陵墓、雕塑等等细节非常清晰精致好看，完全符合历史！震撼人心的金字塔以及秀丽的风景让人沉浸其中无法自拔；我常会不由自主的骑着我心爱的小骆驼漫步在荒漠的金字塔下以及尼罗河畔欣赏风景，体验古埃及当地的风土人情，真不愧是“旅游模拟器”的称号。和以往作品单一的潜行刺杀不同，此部加入了天赋系统和装备升级，让玩法更加多种多样，武器众多互动操作打击手感也很舒服，我可以在一名猎人、刺客、狂战士这些身份随心情切换！
作为育碧神话三部曲的开山之作，我认为起源是此系列的神作！感谢上百位历史学者和工作人员能让我体验到如此宏大唯美的史诗级游戏！没想到开局即巅峰，虽然育碧目前依旧在作死的道路上越行越远，但此系列仍不乏几款佳作！强烈推荐！

183848192.review:
If you are new to Assassin's Creed games or new to open-world in general, this is certainly a game for you to try. The map is humongous, but do not be overwhelmed by it. There is easily 60 hours of content available to you at any level difficulty, meaning you can have a challenge or relax. The story is not the best because I think there are too few objectives and I would have liked there to be maybe 20 targets however I think they did just fine with 12. 

The only people who won't like this game are the die-hard fans for this franchise. This is my first ever Assassin's Creed game and I still think it is a well made game because it was the first game to introduce true free roaming in other AC games, and stealth missions aren't auto-fail, which means you can just become a true warrior and turn the game into Berserker's Creed.

I would also like to highly praise whoever made the tombs in this game because I was honestly expecting a jumpscare every single time. Thank god they didn't stray into the horror category.

183764615.review:
经过60小时游玩，全成就心得。附带IGN评分：
作为2017年育碧作品，《刺客信条起源》是神话三部曲的首部，也是整个系列转型的一次尝试。这部高水准的大作，本人已经是第三次游玩了。第一次还是七年前玩的盗版，第二次是在EPIC上面玩的，这次则是在steam补票了终极版并且全成就通关！个人非常喜欢这部，强烈推荐给大家游玩！同时，当年各大外媒对于本作好评如潮，评分总体都在8分以上！IGN更是为本作打出了9.0分的逆天高分！

优点：
1、优美地还原了古埃及设定，展示了各具特色的文化和活动。

2、游戏画面与还原度程度令人难以置信，细节也很出众。

3、引人入胜的剧情和关键人物让游戏一直很有趣。

4、众多值得注意、令人难以忘怀的支线任务。

缺点：

1、一贯的技术性和育碧拉胯的优化问题。

2、较为笨拙的战斗和潜行系统。

从本质上来说，《刺客信条：起源》很大程度上与十年前发售的《刺客信条》是同样的游戏。它是一种广受玩家喜爱的公式化作品，而这个公式在几年的时间里无疑也得到了打磨和改进。毫无疑问，《刺客信条：起源》是这个“公式”最棒的迭代。但是玩家们也期待着新鲜的玩法和创意，能够像《起源》打造的这个奇妙世界，为大家带来更多惊奇的感觉！接下来就是准备入手并完美通关《刺客信条：奥德赛》了！虽然现在外媒都在唱衰育碧，不过个人还是希望育碧能知耻而后勇！看看隔壁EA，经历了《战地：2042》的灾难级表现后，都学会悬崖勒马！

After 60 hours of playing, all the experiences have been accomplished. Comes with IGN Ratings:
As a 2017 Ubisoft title, Assassin's Creed Origins is the first installment of the mythological trilogy and an attempt to transform the entire series. This high-level masterpiece is the third time I've played it. The first time was a pirated version played seven years ago, the second time I played it on EPIC, and this time I made up the Ultimate Edition on steam and cleared all the achievements! Personally, I like this very much, and I highly recommend it to everyone! At the same time, the major foreign media praised this work very well, and the overall score was above 8 points! IGN even gave this game a high score of 9.0!

Merit:
1. It beautifully restores the setting of ancient Egypt and shows its unique culture and activities.

2. The game screen and degree of restoration are incredible, and the details are outstanding.

3. The intriguing plot and key characters make the game fun all the time.

4. Numerous noteworthy and memorable side quests.

Shortcoming:

1. Consistent technicality and optimization of Ubisoft's crotch pull.

2. Clumsy combat and stealth systems.

Essentially, Assassin's Creed: Origins is largely the same game as Assassin's Creed, which was released a decade ago. It's a formula that's been loved by players, and it's certainly been polished and improved over the course of a few years. Without a doubt, Assassin's Creed: Origins is the best iteration of this "formula". But players are also looking forward to fresh gameplay and creativity, which can bring more amazing feelings to everyone in this wonderful world created by Origins! Now it's time to get ready and beat Assassin's Creed: Odyssey perfectly! Although foreign media are now singing about Ubisoft, I personally hope that Ubisoft can be ashamed and courageous! Look at EA next door, after the disastrous performance of "Battlefield: 2042", they all learned to pull back from the precipice!

183668228.review:
我是从刺客信条第一部一路玩到这一部的，这是目前玩过最新的一部，我觉得我可以给出绝对客观的评价：
[list]
[*]首先不推荐，莫名其妙的压级机制，跨越三级就是叶凡来了都得遭殃。我把生命值，攻击力肝到上限也扛不住高三级以上敌人两刀，打他也就掉层皮，也就是说这游戏完全就是一个苛刻的等级制度，攻击和防御没有任何意义。
[*]重复性拉满极度无聊的支线。感觉在给全埃及NPC当保姆，一会谁家孩子丢了一会谁家牛子被下毒了。因为等级会一直跟不上主线，你必须强迫性的做一大堆无聊的支线，大致流程全都是跑图，收集线索，跑图，打架。后面就算全部快进跳过也会被折磨到毫无兴致。最操蛋的就是跑图和收集线索，毫无意义的推理，整的像吉田步美模仿柯南去调查毛利小五郎一样，有种弱智查弱智的美，凶手留一地的线索，主角摸着血告诉你这好像发生了打斗。
[*]开放世界的玩法，但是受限于等级制度，你无法在更高等级的环境中体验到乐趣，而且没有任何收集的必要，因为武器系统做的一滩烂泥，感觉完全就是枭雄的灵感，你甚至能在前期获得一身神装，但是这游戏是等级决定一切，装备和武器可以说没有任何线性的提升，说出去能被玩原神的笑话。
[*]战斗系统一滩烂泥。所有战斗模式基本上都是重复的，要么一群哥布林对你骑马射箭，要么一个牛头人模仿我奶奶提刀砍人。根本不像是刺客，你基本上只能刺杀同等级和更低等级的人，等级更高刺杀都不掉血。
[*]为什么我能坚持这么久？因为我是傻逼，以为能跟以往刺客信条一样二十小时结束主线，没料到育碧用等级逼着我去做支线，玩的像是被育碧强暴了一样，有的人觉得它大可能能享受，我只觉得它又臭又长。
[/list]

183661449.review:
Masterpiece of a game, at first I really started to love it, then hate it and as of now, that I am lvl 27 I really really REALLY love this game... You just need to get used to the fast paced combat and asssassins creed animations, because they are not bad, but they are literally designed for this game if you know what I mean, I love RDR2 so I was really used to the realism of anything, so it was quite hard for me to comprehend that a game can be still a masterpiece without horses having their testicles get shrunk in winter... I really enjoy this game and I am so happy that I bought the Golden Edition. Definitely a masterpiece! Open world 10/10, missions, can get a bit boring if you're overwhelmed but generally a 8/10, combat system, it's very interesting though I am not sure if I'm necessarily a fan of it, but it still feels smooth and cool, especially after some hours of playing it, prolly somewhere in 8/10 because it either can be bad or good, depends on how you move. I really love about this game the general accessibility, like that you don't have to drive across the whole map just to go get something or don't have to do something extremely boring and the fact that the game don't force you to do all this filler sh## like it is in many many games, I really love it! 9/10, the parkour could've been better tho, because sometimes it's annoying when your character don't listen to you and instead of jumping off some flower pot he jumps to another flower pot smh.


[b][u]Also for anyone having BAD performance issues:

Go search Vulkan for AC Origins, it is a miracle! The DirectX11 the game runs on natively is such a trash! I had on ultra & lowest settings 29fps, got really hopeless and then searched some performance tweak videos and somebody implemented Vulkan in it, very easy installation and I am currently running 100-120fps on ultra settings thanks to it!

垃圾，剧情还可以，攻击动作就做的不行了，小兵长矛戳一下就出一个硬直，空格也不能快速解除这个硬直，只能强迫你挨第二下攻击，那为什么不干脆把敌人的攻击全换成处决，反正对面打我一下动都动不了，进入竞技场后把武器的平A连招砍了，只能砍三刀，这种卡刀的攻击动作玩起来真的很难受，遇到的敌人要么招数0帧起手给你打个硬直然后让你被迫吃下第二招，要么就像竞技场那个拿双斧的狗一样超长范围攻击，不仅难躲，还会无限复读那个B招，育碧动作组是不是只会双斧劈砍连招复读啊，打来打去就几招

183575881.review:
Origins marque le début d'une nouvelle ère pour la série Assassin's Creed, qui s'oriente officiellement vers un gameplay de type RPG. Cela n'est pas réellement dérangeant, car bien amené, mais le système qui donne à un ennemi ayant au moins trois niveaux de plus que vous BEAUCOUP plus de vie et de puissance est très frustrant. Cela nous oblige à accomplir des quêtes annexes et à explorer la carte, ce qui s'avère finalement être un mal pour un bien.

J'apprécie également l'appropriation de l'histoire par Ubisoft, qui explique ici comment Jules César a été assassiné (dans la réalité, on suppose un assassinat, mais on ne sait pas par qui), dans le contexte d'un conflit naissant entre Assassins et Templiers.

Quelques bugs de caméra sur PC et des légers freezes désagréables lors des temps de chargement viennent entacher l'expérience. Dans l'ensemble, le jeu est très bon, mais il donne parfois une impression surchargé avec trop d'activités à réaliser, mais peut-on reprocher à un jeu de trop nous en offrir ?

183562329.review:
2020年通关本体和DLC，2024年黑猴全成就后突然对刷全成就有了兴趣，于是下回来，时至今日终于全成就。

但是时隔四年有了一个很大的变动，因此必须给差评。

之前玩的时候，可以在流浪商人瑞达那里接每日任务，做完给秘法宝箱，也可以花3000金币无限购买。但是现在重新玩发现秘法宝箱被取消了，死狗育碧是想恶心谁呢？不止起源，我在steam买的狗1无法联机，但是ubi平台的可以，狗2也有Bug，还有很多steam没有成就但是ubi平台有成就的游戏。我只想说死狗育碧不想让大家在steam玩你可以不上架，又要上架又区别对待你恶心谁呢？咋了steam上买的没给你钱？

加了很多现实中的熟人朋友，不方便骂太难听，祝死狗育碧继续倒腾那沙比DEI，期待明年《AC：东洋尼》褒姒。

最后附上解决方法，下mod回调登录版本可以重新拥有秘法宝箱，详情见：BV1RCtFeDEFh  新入手的玩家记得按视频方法操作，这是你本应体验的游戏内容。

183535872.review:
Nice atmosphere and graphics. The combat isn't that bad either, i actually like it. And from what I've played so far, the story is one of the best in the franchise. Now one very big problem with the game is its terrible optimisation. And when i say terrible i mean TERRIBLE. Uses like 50-60% of my GPU on very high preset resulting in me having to play the game at 40-60fps, and no, its not the drivers. I've been having this problem since i first bought the game, and it hasn't changed since then. Ubisoft was able to add achievements but cant fix the performance? 

Poor optimisation aside, this game is a solid 8.5/10. But im still going to downvote because Ubisoft sucks.

Ich wollte dieses Spiel unbedingt nochmals spielen, da es noch einer der guten Ableger war, aber es war zu erwarten, dass das Spiel nicht richtig läuft, genau wie bei Ubisoft selbst, da geht ja auch gor nix mehr. Ich habe schon Blähungen von diesen beschissenen Freezes. Wieso wird so etwas bitte überhaupt noch angeboten? Heißt das, nur weil das Game alt ist, dass es keinen Support mehr für neuere Hardware bekommt? Schade, ich war schon bereit In-Game Geld auszugeben, damit ich deren unendlichen gieriger Rachen bis zur Erstickung vollstopfen kann.

Halten wir fest, totale Zeitverschwendung + Ubisoft ist und bleibt ein kompletter Totalausfall, verlässt du dich auf deren Qualität, bist du komplett verlassen.
